alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:57AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain early Friday will mix with sleet and snow late Friday afternoon and likely become all snow during Friday night. Total ice accumulations will range between 0.05 to 0.20 inches. Total combined sleet and snow accumulations will run less than 1 inch. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Carolina and southeast North Carolina. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The combined ice, sleet and snow accumulations will make traveling extremely hazardous. Scattered power outages and tree damage may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures during daylight Friday will hold at or below 32 degrees, before dropping well into the 20s Friday night into early Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extreme caution when traveling ice and snow covered roadways. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
